applyNote.firstParagraph: It's quick to apply for an {{system.vendorName}} {{product.loanType}}. We only need a few details to make a decision.

privacyNote.label: Policy
privacyNote.text:
By engaging with us and completing this application, you should be made aware that a use of your personal data will be conducted by Be Bank Ltd and/or UK and number of additional entities which Bebank Ltd and/or UK engage with as part of this application.

Please review in detail our: Use Of Personal Data policy for processing your personal data through external entities for your loan application. Reading the âuse of personal informationâ policy is mandatory prior to beginning the application.

I consent that I have read and understood the information indicated in the Use Of Personal Data policy

consents.termsAndConditions: I have read and accept the Terms & Conditions.
consents.authorizedDirector: I am a director of the business specified and have the authority to complete a loan application.
consents.personalGuarantee: I understand that if I proceed with this loan application, I will be required to provide a personal guarantee of the company loan. This means that if the company can not make payment of the loan, I can be held personally liable and required to make payment of the loan from my personal assets.
consents.disclaimer: These consents do not commit you to apply for any borrowing.

communicationOptions.label: Marketing preferences
communicationOptions.text: We will continually work to enhance your options by offering new products and services to save you money. Please approve your preferred communication channels to use when sharing what we and our partners have created with you in mind.
communicationOptions.subtitle: You may change the method of communication or unsubscribe to our marketing material at any time by reaching us via customercare@bebank.com

meta.keepInformedParagraph: {{system.vendorName}} will not share your information with third parties for their own marketing purposes.

pleaseNoteParagraph.LIMITED_COMPANY: Please note: We do not carry out full credit checks. We will carry out a soft credit search on you and any directors whose details you provide. This will not affect your credit score, and can not be seen by other lenders.
pleaseNoteParagraph.SOLE_TRADER: Please note: we do not carry out full credit checks. We will carry out a soft credit search on you. This will not affect your credit score, and can not be seen by other lenders.

front.title: ID
front.description: Please take a front photo of your driving licence or passport
quickTips: For passports - take a photo of the photo page in your passport
Place your ID on a plain background
Place your ID on a flat surface
Place your ID parallel to frame
Make sure the ID is fully captured
Make sure all holograms are captured
Make sure no reflection is projected on the ID

selfie.title: Selfie
selfie.description: Please take a picture of yourself
quickTips: Be facing forwards and look straight at the camera
Have your eyes open and visible
Wear glasses if they appear in your ID
Remove any head coverings (unless itâs for religious or medical reasons)
Make sure there aren't shadows on your face or behind you
Donât have more than one person in the photo
Take a photo in a well-lit area

tradingActivity.label: What is your primary trading activity?

values.REAL_ESTATE: Real Estate - including property development / investment / letting / management on fee or contract basis / estate agency
values.MANUFACTURING_CHEMICAL_PRODUCTS: Manufacturing - chemicals / fuels / gases / petrol / oil / mineral products
values.MANUFACTURING_AMMUNITION: Manufacturing of explosives / explosive products / weapons and ammunition
values.POWER_SUPPLY: Power supply - eg electricity / gas / steam
values.RENTING_NON_PROPERTY_GOODS: Renting / leasing of non property goods

annualRevenue.label: What was your turnover in the last 12 months?

tooltip.content: This should be your most recent total annual revenue (sales, turnover and any other income). Minimum Â£{{widgetsConfig.loanee.annualRevenue.LIMITED_COMPANY.validationRules, validationRule:min}} and Maximum Â£{{widgetsConfig.loanee.annualRevenue.LIMITED_COMPANY.validationRules, validationRule:max}}

Commonly referred to as sales. This is the total amount of money your business has received over the past year before any costs and expenses have been deducted. Usually found at the top of your profit & loss statement for the financial year.
This should be your most recent annual net profit before tax.
This is the money your business has made after costs and expenses have been deducted. Usually found at the bottom of your profit and loss statement.
This should be the total current monthly repayments. This is for any business debts, including loans, mortgages and leases.

This is the total amount of money the business pays out monthly for any business debts. Business debts include but are not limited to loans, mortgages, HP and leases. Check against your bank statements if in doubt.
This should be the total annual minimum dividends that are required by directors of the business for living expenses. This should exclude any director salaries.

The total amount of money withdrawn from the business for personal reasons. Drawings include but are not limited to contributions to pension, national insurance, tax, living costs e.g. food and personal mortgage or rent.

review.label: We are reviewing your application
review.text:
Thank you for applying for a loan with beBank. We are reviewing your application and will get back to you as soon as possible.
If you have any questions please give us a call on 1111 111 1111 or contact us at support@bebank.com.

message.label: Dear Broker,
message.text1: You are filling the loan application forms for your customer, {{val}}.
message.text2: For any assistance, please contact us

addAccounts.title: Add accounts
addAccounts.text: You can either send the application to your customer to link/upload account details, or upload details on their behalf below. Remember that we need at least one source of bank account/VAT data, and the more sources we receive the more likely we are to be able to accurately assess your application and provide a loan offer

sendToCustomer.title: Send to customer
sendToCustomer.text: Choose this option and your customer will be able to link their account and/or upload their VAT data to enable us to rapidly assess their application and provide an automated decision in most cases.
sendToCustomer.line1: When customer link their account and/or upload VAT data it enables us to rapidly assess their application and provide an automated decision, in most cases.
sendToCustomer.line2: Click on the âFinish laterâ button, which will close this tab and present the previous one. On that tab, click on 'Send' to send the application to your customer for upload/link the data.

consents.termsAndConditions:
I am a Broker and can confirm that:

I hold authorization from the Applicant to complete a loan application on behalf of the Applicant

I have disclosed the Terms & Conditions of the loan to the Applicant, including the requirement to provide a guarantee, and explained the fee structure as well as disclosing commission paid to me as Broker and the Applicant has confirmed their understanding and consented to the Terms & Conditions.
The Applicant has confirmed that they hold authorization from the other officers, financial partners and beneficial owners to consent to the searches against them as individuals and use of the information as indicated in the Terms & Conditions.
consents.authorizedDirector: I can confirm that the Applicant is a director of the business and I have explained to them that they will be required to provide a personal guarantee of the companyâs loan and that they may have to pay if the company is not able to.

meta.communicationOptions: {{system.vendorName}} would like to keep you informed by letter, phone, email and text message about products, services and offers that we believe may be of interest to you. If you do not wish us to contact you for these purposes, please place a cross in the box.
meta.keepInformedParagraph: {{system.vendorName}} will not share your information with third parties for their own marketing purposes.
meta.pleaseNoteParagraph: Please note: We do not carry out full credit checks. We will carry out a soft credit search on you. This will not affect your credit score, and can not be seen by other lenders.

loanRequest.content: Please select the loan amount and term you wish to apply for. An arrangement fee and broker fee if applicable can either be paid up front, or added to the loan amount paid to you. Our fees are available for review. Interest is charged on the full loan amount, including fees if added to the loan amount.

listItems: Yodlee is a third party service provider and is an entirely separate company to {{system.vendorName}}.
You will have to enter into an agreement directly with Yodlee in order to use their services. {{system.vendorName}} will not be a party to this agreement.
Yodlee will use your data in accordance with their terms and conditions
Linking your company bank account via Yodlee may require you to provide...
We will only receive the last 12 months bank statements from Yodlee. Neither {{system.vendorName}} nor Yodlee will have continuous access to your account.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed;
  • the Login User ID and Password that you use for your Sage 50 account.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed;
  • the Login User ID and Password that you use for your Sage 200 account.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed;
  • the SQL User ID and Password that can access the Sage 300 database you wish to upload.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.
In order to link to your software, you will need to input the User ID and Password that you use to login to your Xero account on the next page.
We use a third party Validis to link the information.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed;
  • To know the SQL Server Instance Name, the Database Name and the Company name you wish to upload data from.
  • the SQL User ID and Password that can access the Microsoft Dynamics database you wish to upload.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed;
  • To know the SQL Server Instance Name and the Company name you wish to upload data from. (If you donât know this, you will need to know the ODBC DSN for the SQL Instance where your Microsoft Dynamics GP Database is located)
  • the SQL User ID and Password that can access Microsoft dynamics database you wish to upload.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.

In order to link to your software, you will need:
  • to be logged into the computer on which your accounting software is installed
  • the Login User ID and Password that you use for your Quickbooks Desktop account.
We use a third party Validis to link the information. You will need to install their plugin which you can do by clicking next to take you to the next page
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.
In order to link to your software, you will need the User ID and Password that you use to login to your Quickbooks Online account on the next page.
We use a third party Validis to link the information.
Whilst this can take up to a few minutes now, it will help us to make a quicker decision.
